About J-Pop

J-Pop is a genre that has captured my musical interest with its distinctive characteristics and artistic expression. This collection features 83 tracks from 26 different artists, spanning across 65 albums. The genre showcases a diverse range of styles and interpretations, each track contributing to the rich tapestry of J-Pop music. With a total of 7226 plays, these tracks represent some of the most engaging and memorable music in this genre from my collection.
